website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable twin XL bedding set that only contains the basics.
pros: Available in five different color options
Simple and inexpensive three-piece bedding sheet with flat sheet, fitted sheet, and pillowcase
Very comfortable 100 percent cotton fabric with a 400-thread count
cons: No comforter and only one pillowcase in this bedding set

customer_reviews.title: the color was awesome, the feel was so soft they felt so ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to order these sheets, the color was awesome, the feel was so soft they felt so light. Washed them wrinkled alot...Owell they are sheets... put them on my bed, felt good, stayed on the my mattress, a week later... Damm.... they shredded at the bottom where our feet are. Wasted my money!!!!!!!! And its to late to return... DO NOT BUY>>>>>> DO NOT BUY>>>>>>>>DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Damschen

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Quality
customer_reviews.text: The sheets looked good, but they were a bit slippery, leading me to believe that perhaps they are not truly 100% cotton. The top sheet I though was a bit short (I bought a Queen size sheet set. Only hangs about 6 ins on each side. Not a whole lot. After washing, I noticed a slight white fuzz all over the sheets and pillow cases. The sheets were washed by themselves, so it couldn't have come from something else. All in all, I don't think this was a good deal. I have bought Williamsburg 400TC Sheet Set which are $90, but they are the real deal and seem to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Vidal

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift. They appear to be good quality and color is true to picture, the dark grey. My only issue is that no where on the packaging does it say long staple cotton. I wonder if they are just cotton sheets? Hard to tell until they are washed and the fact that they are a sateen really makes me wonder. Good long staple cotton, after a washing or two, should have the softness of flannel but the the lightness and breath ability of linen. If my daughter reports back I’ll update.
customer_reviews.author: Dee S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great sheets. VERY soft
customer_reviews.text: Great sheets. Super soft. I thought I'd order the 400 count and see what they were like, and if I liked them I'd get the 500 count or higher. 100% satisfied with the softness of the 400 count. It wasn't EXACTLY what I was looking for, I wanted sheets that are very cool to the touch. These are not that. They aren't bad, they don't super heat up uncomfortably, but they weren't what I was looking for. I've only lucked out with very cool to the touch sheets twice in my life - and unfortunately I wore holes through both sets after years and years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year
customer_reviews.text: They started off great (soft, cozy, comfortable, etc.) and then not even a year later, now are threadbare and ripped. Sheets should last longer than 11 months before falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not same after first wash
customer_reviews.text: Just got these. Really nice right out of box. Washed and dried according to directions. Not nearly as nice after first wash. Seemed much thinner and lost sheen. Compared to 4 year old Threshold, Threshold is higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ric Lbon

customer_reviews.title: Sheet Set is Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love the fabric. It is very soft. I also love the pillow cases. They fit perfectly on my queen size pillows. The color is beautiful. I now have two sets and love them both.
customer_reviews.author: Gama M.

customer_reviews.title: As soft and silky as expensive sheets
customer_reviews.text: I waited 2 months before writing the review because I wanted to see how they hold up to a few washes and I'm thoroughly impressed. These sheets are soft and silky even after a few washes. I won't say that they are good for the price because they are on part with other more expensive sheets I've bought. I've got a standard depth queen and there is a little extra space but not sure if it would work for a pillow top.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Orban

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheets
customer_reviews.text: As good and the $100+ sheets I have purchased, not only do they feel nice but the elastic all around keeps the sheet in place. I have a 10 inch foam mattress which normally causes a problem with a deep pocket sheets but these work great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: Out of 6 tries this one was Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Here is how I ended up with these sheets: bought multiple sets 300ct Percal, 600 sateen, 800 sateen, 600 plain weave and this set at 400 thread count. THIS IS THE ONLY SET I'M KEEPING. my husband wants very breathable sheet, I want something that is soft (not stiff). 600 and 800 didn't breath enough for hubby, the 300 was super stiff/rough and not comfortable against my skin. I'm sure there are better sheets out there... But at the sub $100 for king sheets this is the best I've found for what I wanted. Side note: they are cotton, they do wrinkle but flatten nicely on the bed and are not noticed when sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality at a Reasonable Price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Queen sized set in Silver, with an extra set of pillow cases. It coordinates beautifully with a navy and gray comforter I bought. I had questions about the color and was contacted directly by customer service at the company along with color swatches. They were great! Real personal service! The sheets are cotton, which I wanted, for coolness. They do have some wrinkles out of the dryer, but that can be minimized by 2 dryer sheets and removing promptly. Overall, I am very satisfied, and would buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Enviromental Efforts 5-stars, Sheets 1 star
customer_reviews.text: The packaging and pro-environment efforts like no plastic and using cotton trimmings to create the bags for the sheets is great. Unfortunately you are buying sheets not sheet packaging. The sheets lasted for a total of 3 weeks of usage / 3 washings before becoming noticeably pilled. They also never fit a standard King correctly. Yes, big enough and deep enough pockets but the sides never quite covered the bed. I appreciate the environmental efforts but cannot recommend this product. Cheap think sheets that are not very comfortable even on first use.
customer_reviews.author: Locator Lance

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, but...
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are very comfortable and soft, we have purchased many sets. Unfortunately this go around, after the first wash, the threading at the top of the top sheet came undone. Super displeased about this as we haven't experienced this issue before. Hoping it's just a fluke. Disappointed to have to give a poor review.
customer_reviews.author: samuel c hauck

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortably soft
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my new 10" Puffy mattress. Fits perfectly and the color is exactly what I was hoping for. What ever the stuff is that they put in the material was absolutely terrible as I put the sheets into the washer. Washed and dried perfectly. So far after 1 wash, I am pleased with this sheet set.
customer_reviews.author: Kerryn

customer_reviews.title: Corona Mask
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I bought these to make Covid 19 masks. The high thread count, 400 per inch, make it a good choice for these. I'm just finishing up a set of these masks now. The material is very soft, and I'm teaming it with dust mite resistant non-woven fabric to make effective, and washable, masks.
customer_reviews.author: Le H.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable and great value!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for soft sheets that didn't cost a fortune. These sheets are soft, smooth, comfortable and have a nice deep fitted sheet too. After washing them, they still felt great and did not have a lot wrinkles. Definitely a great value for the price and certainly very comfortable. Had a nice color selection and delivered promptly too.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Fox

customer_reviews.title: Sensual Luxury
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of these sheets. Wash beautifully, though somewhat wrinkly, but that's the nature of 100% cotton. I have been looking for 400 TC sheets that don't shrink up when washed, feel silky smooth to the touch, and fit a pillowtop mattress. These meet all my criteria plus they are amply sized. My search has ended. I will definitely be purchasing more in the future. I also appreciate the eco friendly packaging and the attention to detail. Well done Threadmill !
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Expert

customer_reviews.title: Great sheet - wonderful baby blue color
customer_reviews.text: Great sheets. Very soft and durable. I give my sheets the washer test right out of the box. These have been washed 3 or 4 times are still look new. We'll see how they look in a year. I've had my previous sheets for almost 5 years of course rotating about 3 sets out weekly to bi weekly. I expect these to stand up to the same wear and tear. They are not wrinkle free unless you iron them, but most sheets aren't. Not a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi M.

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on silk
customer_reviews.text: Size is perfect for 15" high queen mattress. Fitted sheet big enough to tuck in the sides so it doesn't bunch under you when sleeping and the top sheet is large enough to cover two people comfortably. Might be the best sheets I've ever had. And love the cotton tote bag they came in, it was an extra perk that is great for errands.
customer_reviews.author: Tatezi

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sheets! They are made of a really nice material, and they feel smooth and polished. Love them. The fact that everything in the process of making them is environmentally friendly is a great added inducement.
customer_reviews.author: LudmillaM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and not hot
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of these. I used the others for a couple of years but white doesn’t stay pretty as other colors would. Comfortable to sleep on and not hot.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Westheiden

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy into the 1000 thread count non sense, these are the real real just plain ole 400 count no fancy made up big numbers game. They fit our 13" high mattress with plenty of extra height available for bigger mattress. Although they are made in India it seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Dana P. Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Quality sheets....i love them!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time looking for nice sheets at a good price. They are soft and fit my mattress very well at 16inch thick. The top sheet is not short. As for wrinkles, take them out of dryer quick. I dont consider them very wrinkled but also not a high priority. The light blue was what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Denmark

customer_reviews.title: Good value, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Six months in, I'm still happy with these sheets. They're thinner than Kirkland's 400 threadcount sheets. They are very soft and comfortable, but lack the sheen expected of sateen weaves, so they feel slightly warmer. For the price, I would consider them again.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Harkins

customer_reviews.title: They are cotton
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for use on extra length hospital bed. They are soft & comfortable. So far they have washed well. Yes they are a little wrinkled but not enough to complain about. As long as they get folded or put on bed soon as they are out of the dryer, they are fine. Worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.author: sybil

customer_reviews.title: Sadly Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sheets based on the awesome reviews, but am very disappointed. These are not the soft silky sateen sheets I am used to using on my bed. I washed them before putting them on the bed and will probably only use them for the night or as a last resort.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love these sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with these sheets. They fit so good, nice elastic, easy to put on. Sheets are smooth and soft and lightweight. Very good quality. I really liked how they were packaged too.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Fabric
customer_reviews.text: Quality of fabric seems good. Packaging was like a high end product. Color was as shown on website. Only negative (and it is slight) was the smell right out of package. In dryer now so I am confident it will no longer be a factor. So far, pleased with product and purchase.
customer_reviews.author: redhead

customer_reviews.title: Long enough BUT
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are ok and they are long enough but just not wide enough for the deep mattress's and if you also have a topper the sheets barely cover the sides. Sheet Sets bought together seem to be scaled to standard size mattress's only. A couple more inches in width as well as the length would have given the sheets 5 stars but these are just so so.
customer_reviews.author: Paul P. Anderzunas

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not good at buying sheets. Never seem to get it right. I hit the jackpot this time! Wow! They are soft, soft, soft! I kept the information aboutnthe company so I know where to get sheets in the future. I also appreciate sustainability in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality
customer_reviews.text: An example of good marketing for a poor product. Sheets shrank even after following manufacturer's instructions. Very thin and I don't think they will last a year even when in rotation with other sheet sets.
customer_reviews.author: evereddie

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Not as soft as I was hoping. Admittedly my skin may be a bit more sensitive to rougher cloth. The sheets are starting to pill a little and lose any smooth texture they had. Bought these in January/February. I would probably use these on a guest bed that doesn't get used often. Would not get these again for my own bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable feel
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are awesome and feel so comfortable to sleep on. Especially on a cold night and feel the coolness trapped inside until your body heat warms it up. Pretty cool sensation:)
customer_reviews.author: logain99

customer_reviews.title: Shrink a lot!!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the packaging and color and the sheets until they were washed. Although I washed in cool water and dried on low temp they still shrunk up so much that the fitted sheet was tight and the pillow case too small for pillow. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product was more than I expected from the quality to the color. Finding a perfect lilac/lavender that was a soft hue is difficult. The color was perfect combined with a quality that I have only found in much more expensive sheets was outstanding. I will be buying a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Cozzimomo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sheet
customer_reviews.text: I love the light sheen of the finish on these sheets...They are very soft and cool to sleep on and they fit well on my deep mattress. The beige color is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: jonahb

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: Ive purchased from this provider before and was very happy with the sheets. This time I got a lesser threadcount and there was a big difference. The sheets were very thin and get very wrinckled. I would only buy again in higher threadcount. Not worth the savings.
customer_reviews.author: oupa

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: these cotton sheets over microfiber sheets. They are soft, comfortable, breathe (no perspiring), the color I chose was as described and the price was reasonable for cotton sheets.
customer_reviews.author: KBKCI

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy ☺
customer_reviews.text: I can find nothing wrong with this product. I will probably but more sheets like this one but in different colors. Acceptable delivery time as well.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Sklenar

customer_reviews.title: Wish They Were a Little Softer
customer_reviews.text: Not as soft as we'd like, but decent for the money we spent.
customer_reviews.author: loripori

customer_reviews.title: Not bad sheets
customer_reviews.text: Looks good initally and are pretty comfortable, but after 1 or 2 washes the color faded to almost yellow/white in multiple spots. Other than the coloring, decent sheets for the price.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Cool & soft
customer_reviews.text: Silk-like cotton, comfort feel. I like cool sheets as I get hot while sleeping-these help. Feels cool to the touch. Good quality for the price too. Only 3 stars for durability as I haven’t had them long enough to rate. They’ve been through 2 washings so far and still good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rough and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to these sheets but both myself and my partner are pretty disappointed. The sheets are on the rougher side. Feels nothing like satin. They're much warmer than I expected. Which is a real bummer since we bought these as light weight summer sets. It's so different in feel from the description I almost wonder if they sent the wrong set.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent soft sheets. Even softer after a couple of washes.
customer_reviews.author: Saravanan Shanmugham

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and nice color.
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are amazing! I never knew about “long-stapled” cotton. I quickly learned this is what one looks for when shopping for sheets. These are soft and luxurious. I hope they stand the test of tome.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M Cook

customer_reviews.title: Soooo soft!
customer_reviews.text: These are SO SOFT and light. Feels like a dream after a long day. They do wrinkle IMMEDIATLEY after drying in the dryer. Wrinkles improve with each wash. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheets
customer_reviews.text: We have a very tall mattress. Fitted sheet still had room to spare. They are soft and breathable. They were too big and we washed in hot water and dryer on high heat to shrink them a bit to fit bed better. That worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom W.

customer_reviews.title: Huge tear in one of the pillowcases.
customer_reviews.text: Huge tear in one of the pillowcases. Nice sheets otherwise. I just need one replacement pillowcase but there’s no option for that, just returns.
customer_reviews.author: Matt360

customer_reviews.title: Softest ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these sheets. The softest sheets I’ve ever felt. Still feel fantastic after a couple washings. Very high quality. I wasn’t expecting much given the price, but I’ll never buy anything else again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BED SHEETS
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied with this sheet set, and I'm going to buy another set as soon as I'm finished writing the review.
customer_reviews.author: OBJECTIVE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality - given as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality - given as a gift. Person I gave them to said he loved them so much he stayed in bed all day when he first put them on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Caudle

customer_reviews.title: Different color than ordered
customer_reviews.text: The sheets seem nice, but got a different color than ordered. I ordered white and got a pinkish color instead (maybe the rose color?) it's a really pretty color, so I'm going to keep these and will update the review on the quality of the sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Riley

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love them but they are so hard and almost scratchy
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these! I got a recommendation from a blog and wanted to give them a try. They were not soft or silky AT ALL and only got worse when I washed them. I would have loved to return them but since I washed them, I can't.
customer_reviews.author: MBF

customer_reviews.title: Beware: the seams open up
customer_reviews.text: Nice sheets; but within one month the seam opened up in one corner. The sheet was replaced (sent from India).... but then again the same thing happened. Wrote back to company a second time but didn't get an answer.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Very thin.
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are quite thin, very soft and not at all like the crisp all cotton sheets that don't wrinkle that I have bought in the past. I'll use these, but keep looking for better ones.
customer_reviews.author: M. Goforth

customer_reviews.title: Soft and silky
customer_reviews.text: We just got these and so far absolutely love them. They are really soft and silky, plus I love the company’s ethos. I will come back and re-review these once we have washed/lived with them for a bit. Edit: we have now had them for 5 months and still love them! We ordered another set because they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Marley brewster

customer_reviews.title: Really Soft
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled to find this new company. The sheets are so soft and even come in a recycled bag with cute handles. I admire their method of manufacturing and plan to order more from them. Congrats to you Threadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Burdick

customer_reviews.title: Lovely cotton sheets
customer_reviews.text: I believe all queen sheet sets should contain 4 pillowcases but other than that, I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: MaryJo W.

customer_reviews.title: Best Ive Bought In A Long Time
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that these sheets wash and dry very nicely. They fit my mattress and I love the feel of them. This is actually my second sheet set and if I ever need to purchase more I will most certainly buy these sheets again! I do highly recommend these! I also like the variety of colors, as there are many choices and both sets I purchased, match my comforter!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: High quality at a great price. These sheets are exceptionally soft and have ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality at a great price. These sheets are exceptionally soft and have a beautiful sheen. Definitely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W.

customer_reviews.title: These sheets are very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: They are soft and do wrinkle. If you're looking for sheets that are crisp and wrinkle-free, these are not for you. The ones I purchased have only been washed a couple of times so far, so I can not speak to their durability.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBag

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect transaction - prompt delivery and product as described/expected. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Marithy's Books

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets and here is a matching comforter for it
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft sheets; I instantly bought a second set. Mine were silver and the Confibona 100% down comforter in light grey is also very nice and the fabric is a perfect match (though made by a different company)
customer_reviews.author: KATE

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets, great price!
customer_reviews.text: They are soft, and fit well. A little thin, and probably won't last a long time, but I love the way they feel.
customer_reviews.author: Lava

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I cannot answer this entirely because I receive the wrong size and they didn’t fit my bed. However they seem to like good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: My sons and I love these 400 thread count cotton sheets! Soft, comfy and affordable!!!
customer_reviews.author: HMac

customer_reviews.title: I was on a " staycation" every night!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sheets, luxurious feel. Fit our king bed with pillow topper nicely. Snug at corners, but after a nights sleep, the material relaxed and had slack on the top surface. Still, I felt comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheets
customer_reviews.text: Soft and fits the x long hospital bed mattress. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Director Guy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful softness!
customer_reviews.text: I could have used another inch for mattress depth: The pocket depth for the fitted bottom sheet is a little less than advertised...and we know how important that measurement is! Still I love the product and it just barely fits!
customer_reviews.author: L. Monahan

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets!
customer_reviews.text: Great soft sheets. I was nervous ordering sheets online, but these are great and soft. I bought them for my daughter and she's having a hard time getting her 5 year old brother off her bed now because how soft they are that would be the only down side to them🤣👍
customer_reviews.author: katarzyna michalik

customer_reviews.title: Hi. Im Katie and I’m a sheet snob.
customer_reviews.text: To get 5 stars from my family the sheets have to stay on the corners. Other than that, they are perfect, especially in the summer! They are incredibly soft, cool, and the color is great. Literally the only complaint is it slides off the mattress. For how they feel though, we can deal!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Longbrake

customer_reviews.title: It has a beautiful sheen and feels good
customer_reviews.text: This was a bargain to me! I had looked at similar sheet sets but tried this one for the price. It has a beautiful sheen and feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great sheets! Durable, have lasted a long time and no fading
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Good sheets
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sheets. Only washed once and only had for a week so can't comment on durability. I have a 13" mattress and the fitted sheet is fine but the top sheet doesn't have a lot of tuck in room. Just right for me but don't know about how it would work on a thicker mattress. Washes well with very little wrinkle effect. Overall great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Attylyle

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets
customer_reviews.text: I liked them so much, I bought another set. I now plan on buying sets for the spare bed. These sheets are absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: G & L Gadbois

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my purchase. The quality is good and the material is soft and the warm neutral color is perfect for our needs. The pillow covers are roomy which holds our pillows easily. The price is reasonable and I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice !
customer_reviews.text: Soft and the color I wanted. One of my fav sheets for my bed !
customer_reviews.author: Yarell

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Color seemed more gray than lavender and they are not as soft as I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Reads

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked these sheets so much, I ordered three more sets for family members!!!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying more
customer_reviews.text: Love these sheets! I haven't washed them a lot yet, but they are soft, a little silky and fit well on a deep twin mattress. I also love the reusable bag they arrived in. I bought these for my son, but will be buying from this brand/company for my bed, too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Fadool

customer_reviews.title: Thread beginning to pull
customer_reviews.text: I have had these sheets (light gray) for half a year, and loved them for the first four months. They are soft, but after only 6 months, the threads are starting to pull and the sheets are thinning. I will not be purchasing from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new bed and 3 different sets of sheets for it...these are by far my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Judith L Wojnowski

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great sheets for the price! Googled best sheets and these came up on a couple of those lists and I don’t regret the purchase. I do however have a bed with a pillow top and these sheets do fit very snug but still work great!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Delao

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Full size flat sheet a little small but fits... deep pocket fitted sheet fits well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these sheets
customer_reviews.text: Loved these sheets! They are soft and well made. Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Marie Perez

customer_reviews.title: Best sheets and great price!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé and I love these sheets! I got them in the light blue and the color is exactly as pictured. They’re super comfortable and fit perfectly on the bed. I’m going to buy another set of them, probably the beige!
customer_reviews.author: Allisonmichele241

customer_reviews.title: Product not as stated.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for 'sateen' sheets. While these sheets were advertised as sateen, they do not have a sateen feel. They feel like cotton sheets. Very wrinkled after washing and drying per manufacturer's instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort and Feel
customer_reviews.text: Washed these as soon as they arrived and put them on our bed. Slept like a baby last night. The sheets feel so soft and comfy. They’re not as thick and heavy as sheets I’m used to, but for the value, they are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product exactly as described - nice attention to details in construction.
customer_reviews.author: amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: They are just as promised!
customer_reviews.text: these are the best sheets we have ever slept on! So soft!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Connell

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are so soft and comfortable! I will definitely buy them again.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great value
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these sheets. Silky smooth and at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Abby's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Best Price for Beautiful Sheets
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, cotton sateen sheet set - hard to believe they’re only 400 TC !! Color was true. Deep, deep pockets. Will order again at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Harlow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sheets
customer_reviews.text: Silky smooth, don't pill at all after a year of use. Went and bought more, I loved them so much. Color didn't fade either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are very nice and comfortable. Would recommend them as they were good quality and the price was very reasonable!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Gentner

customer_reviews.title: Softness
customer_reviews.text: My hubby is really picky about our sheets, so this was a Christmas present and we both LOVE the feel and fit. Will be ordering another set in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Pants Nance

customer_reviews.title: Silky feel
customer_reviews.text: Nice sheets, they feel silky and soft. However, they’re not wrinkle free.
customer_reviews.author: Vespa

customer_reviews.title: TOP QUALITY, COMFORT AT A GOOD PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Nice, beautiful, soft sheets; very comfortable. Arrived quickly. Excellent packaging. Would buy from you again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fruitman

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect and feel great
customer_reviews.text: Love them, color is exactly what we expected, they fit perfect and feel wonderful, cool and smooth and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Fletch

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money, but not as soft as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are not as soft as I would like, but not bad for the money. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rhea

product_meta.title: Threadmill Home Linen 400 Thread Count 100% Extra-Long Staple Cotton Sheet Set,Twin XL Sheets, Luxury Bedding, Twin XL Sheets 3 Piece Set,Smooth Sateen Weave,Blue
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY LIVING: Slip into Luxury, exceptionally smooth and soft to the touch, the Opulence 400-Thread Count Sateen sheet sets feature Extra-long staple cotton allowing you to relax into its cool comfort.

SUSTAINABILITY: Sustainable product without compromising on the comfort and style. Made in a state of the art vertically integrated factory entirely powered by Solar and Wind energy. No plastics are used in packaging. Sheet sets are packed in a re-useable tote bag made from 100% cotton.

CRAFTSMANSHIP: Meticulous craftsmanship and expertly woven from the finest extra-long staple cotton yarns to produce super soft luxurious feel which are breathable and long-lasting. Special finishing process to accentuate the Lustre and softness the fabric.

STORY: We take pride in making some of the world’s finest linens respecting the environment and its limits. Genuine 100% cotton single ply with no misleading description. By selling direct to the customers we eliminate the middle man cost allowing us to offer our customers some of the best linens at much affordable cost.

Material: 100% cotton, Set includes 1 flat sheet 66"x102", 1 fitted sheet 39"x80", 1 pillowcase 20"x30". All round elastic fitted sheets with 15-inch-deep pockets are generously sized to fit extra deep and pillow-top mattresses. Care and Wash instructions: Machine wash in warm and tumble dry on low, do not bleach.
